title: Error with multiplication using repeated addition

content.description: The following procedure is intended to return the value of x times y, where x and y are integers. Multiplication is implemented using repeated additions.
content.question:
For which of the following procedure calls does the procedure NOT return the intended value?

Select two answers.

choices.label: The figure presents a line of code. The line of code contains a nested block of code. Line 1: [begin block] Multiply [begin block] 2, 5 [end block] [end block]
The figure presents a line of code. The line of code contains a nested block of code. Line 1: [begin block] Multiply [begin block] 2, −5 [end block] [end block]
The figure presents a line of code. The line of code contains a nested block of code. Line 1: [begin block] Multiply [begin block] −2, 5 [end block] [end block]
The figure presents a line of code. The line of code contains a nested block of code. Line 1: [begin block] Multiply [begin block] −2, −5 [end block] [end block]

content.answer: The figure presents a line of code. The line of code contains a nested block of code. Line 1: [begin block] Multiply [begin block] 2, −5 [end block] [end block]

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
